snippet: Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, who is serving as his own lawyer in his court-martial, asked questions of Army officers on the second day of jury selection.
abstract: Maj Nidal Malik Hasan, Army psychiatrist charged in 2009 Fort Hood shooting rampage, tells potential jurors that he supports the Taliban and the strict Islamic Sharia law.
lead_paragraph: Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, who is serving as his own lawyer in his court-martial, asked questions of Army officers on the second day of jury selection.

headline.main: Texas: Fort Hood Suspect Questions Possible Jurors
headline.print_headline: Texas: Fort Hood Suspect Questions Possible Jurors
